name: The Practice and Science of Drawing_Harold Speed

oMeta.description: Classic approach to the dynamics of drawing by brilliant teacher with insights and practical advice on line drawing, mass drawing, visual memory, materials, and much more. 84 plates and diagrams.
oMeta.title: The Practice and Science of Drawing
